summary: Several survivors of a torpedoed merchant ship in World War II find themselves in the same lifeboat with one of the U-boat men who sunk it.
cast: Tallulah Bankhead|William Bendix|Walter Slezak|Mary Anderson|John Hodiak|Henry Hull|Heather Angel|Hume Cronyn|Canada Lee|William Yetter Jr.
